name: Statue of Liberty
description: A global symbol of freedom standing tall in New York Harbor. Experience breathtaking views and rich American history.

name: The Eiffel Tower
description: The heart of Paris and a true icon of romance. Enjoy panoramic cityscapes from the top of this legendary landmark.

name: Tokyo Downtown
description: A vibrant mix of tradition and cutting-edge modernity. Dive into the neon lights, culture, and unmatched cuisine.

name: Big Ben
description: London's timeless clock tower overlooking the River Thames. A must-see for lovers of history and British charm.

name: Colosseum
description: Step into ancient glory at the Colosseum. Relive the stories of gladiators in one of history's grandest arenas.

name: One Pillar Pagoda
description: A unique symbol of Vietnamese spirituality. Serene, historic, and nestled in the heart of Hanoi's cultural pulse.
